text: At the 1936 Summer Olympics in Berlin, there were 11 swimming events. There were 6 events for men. There were 5 events for women. These events were from Saturday August 8, 1936 to Saturday August 15, 1936. There were 248 swimmers. These swimmers were from 29 different countries. ==Medal table== ==Medals== ===Men's events=== 100 m freestyle 400 m freestyle 1500 m freestyle 100 m backstroke 200 m breaststroke 4 × 200 m freestyle relay Shigeo Arai Shigeo Sugiura Masaharu Taguchi Masanori Yusa Ralph Flanagan John Macionis Jack Medica Paul Wolf Oszkár Abay-Nemes Ferenc Csik Ödön Gróf Árpád Lengyel ===Women's events=== 100 m freestyle 400 m freestyle 100 m backstroke 200 m breaststroke 4 × 100 m freestyle relay Rie Mastenbroek Willy den Ouden Jopie Selbach Tini Wagner Gisela Arendt Ruth Halbsguth Leni Lohmar Ingeborg Schmitz Mavis Freeman Bernice Lapp Olive McKean Katherine Rawls ==Participating nations== There were 248 swimmers. These swimmers were from 29 different nations. * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * * ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1936 Summer Olympics events 1936
title: Swimming at the 1936 Summer Olympics
